title: Pixel 4XL not supporting dual sim
content:
My pixel phone is not supporting the dual sim on stand by option. I am using the same eSim and sim card from my previous pixel 3a XL, so it should be working. Whenever I out the sim card it prompts me to choose a number. 

Let me know if you need more info, and thanks.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
